thread.title: TradeSharp Integrates with Tradier Inc., to provide Traders with Brokerage Services Enhanced Trading Strategies
thread.title_full: TradeSharp Integrates with Tradier Inc., to provide Traders with Brokerage Services and Enhanced Trading Strategies

author: Rosemarie Esposito
title: TradeSharp Integrates with Tradier Inc., to provide Traders with Brokerage Services Enhanced Trading Strategies
text:
Tradier Brokerage, Inc ., the brokerage API company, today announced that TradeSharp has integrated with the Tradier API to enable individual traders using its Algorithmic Trading Platform to benefit from Tradier’s brokerage services, scalability and competitive pricing. Individual investors and traders benefiting from TradeSharp’s flexible architecture and ability to easily automate any rules-based trading strategies in stocks, forex and ETFs, will now be able to make more cost-effective trades and have greater flexibility as a result of the integration with Tradier. “Our integration with Tradier allows us to further simplify and streamline the process and cost-savings around any trade, strengthening the value of our intuitive, automated and algorithmic trading platform provided to our growing community of traders,” said Rasheed Wairach, CEO and Lead Architect, TradeSharp. “With the unbundling of brokerage services that Tradier provides, we are able to grow our user base, more effectively empower equities traders and arm clients with sharper trading tools and strategies.”
“TradeSharp users represent a growing legion of innovative traders demanding real-time, intuitive and flexible trading solutions,” said Craig Russell, Chief Evangelist and SVP of Product at Tradier, Inc . “We are excited by TradeSharp’s integration with our secure Tradier brokerage API to provide a growing community of traders with more freedom and ease-of-use when it comes to brokerage services.”
To learn more about the integration and benefits of the TradeSharp integration with the Tradier Brokerage API, visit: http://www.tradesharp.se/connectors/
For information on Tradier Brokerage, Inc., visit https://brokerage.tradier.com , contact us at (980) 272-3880 or engage with us on Twitter @tradier.
About TradeSharp
TradeSharp is a data feed & broker neutral Algorithmic Trading Platform with the ability to quickly automate rule based trading. TradeSharp has been built using the .NET platform and Traders can code their strategies using C#, which can then be optimized and executed in real time for different asset classes. For more information, visit http://www.tradesharp.se/
TradeSharp is built using the .NET framework and can be customized using any languages including C#. TradeSharp is an Algorithmic Trading Platform that lets trading firms or individuals automate any rules based trading strategies in stocks, forex and ETFs. For more information, visit http://www.tradesharp.se/
About Tradier Brokerage Inc.
Tradier Brokerage, Inc.─ a member of FINRA and SIPC ─ is an independent subsidiary of Tradier, Inc. The Brokerage API enables advisors, entrepreneurs, businesses, developers and active traders to solve their trading and brokerage challenges using the independent content and tool providers of their choice – at simple and competitive prices.
About Tradier, Inc.
Tradier, Inc. (tradier.com) is a cloud-based financial services provider and brokerage API company that offers a groundbreaking platform to serve Platform Providers, Advisors, Developers and Individual Investors. Tradier delivers an innovative set of fully hosted API's, modules and "out of the box" tools that are leveraged by a growing list of providers seeking to create innovative trading and investing experiences.
Created by developers, Tradier is a technology linchpin that works with organizations that want to democratize access to data, trade execution, low cost trading and market connectivity through cloud access. In addition, Tradier’s APIs empowers third-party developers and advisors to build applications such as algorithmic and robotic investing and trading offerings.
The Tradier solution features REST-based and Streaming APIs, and turnkey tools that deliver speed, choice and simplicity – all on a secure platform.
For information on Tradier Inc, visit http://www.Tradier.com or contact us at 980.272.3670.
